import React, { useState } from 'react' import style from './costum.module.css' export default function Calce() { const [count,setcount] = useState(0); const [cou,setcou] = useState(0); const [c,setc] = useState(0) return (

SpaceShip configurator

select color

setcount( 0)}> Snow 0 € setcount( 100)}> Valcano +100 € setcount( 150)}> Sky +150 €

select Power

setcou(0)}>100mw 0 € setcou(200)}>150mw 200 € setcou(500)}>200mw 500 €

wrap drive

setc(0)}>0 € No setc(1000)}>1000 € Yes

Base price 1000 €

Color {count}

Power {cou}

Wrap drive {c}

Total {count + cou + c + 1000}

) }
